thread.title: Vehicle hits pedestrian in Denver on West Colfax Avenue, driver flees
thread.title_full: Vehicle hits pedestrian in Denver on West Colfax Avenue, driver flees

title: Vehicle hits pedestrian in Denver on West Colfax Avenue, driver flees
text:
Published By: Denver Post - Today 
A pedestrian was hit by a vehicle Tuesday night on West Colfax Avenue at the highway ramp onto northbound Interstate 25, police said....
